Recommendation.Description: Use System.Net.Http.HttpClient, System.Net.Http.HttpClientHandler and System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandler instead.
Use System.Net.Http.HttpClient / HttpClientHandler instead.
Not supported - Authentication level is always set to MutualAuthRequested.
